definition: surname Gui/abbr. for Guangxi Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: As long as you get closer to the nose longans , a faint scent came on smelling.
sentences.chinese: 你只要把鼻子湊近桂圓，一種淡淡的清香就撲鼻而來。

sentences.english: Given the fragile gas shortage, add dried longan meat porridge.
sentences.chinese: 心虛氣不足，粥加桂圓肉。

sentences.english: Longan nourishes the heart and calms the mind.
Longans shell is yellow, feels very rough.
sentences.chinese: 桂圓的外殼是黃色的，摸起來很粗糙。

sentences.english: In this way, they must never eat longans .
sentences.chinese: 在這順便說一句，也千萬不要喫桂圓。

sentences.english: In fact, when they may wish to eat longans cup of chrysanthemum tea and not have to worry about the lit.
sentences.chinese: 其實，喫桂圓時不妨來杯菊花茶，就不用擔心上火了。

sentences.english: Longans little, but love it cause you can eat.
sentences.chinese: 桂圓小小的，但是惹人喜愛的它可好喫啦。

definition: monk fruit, the sweet fruit of Siraitia grosvenorii, a vine of the Curcubitaceae family native to southern China and northern Thailand, used in Chinese medicine
milk vetch/plant genus Astragalus/huangqi 黃芪|黄芪, Astragalus membranaceus (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
